__e: She says that you are the scum of the earth.
My dad says that you guys are the scum of the Earth.
Boo-hoo-hoo. We're talking about the scum of the earth here, and we're supposed to make it pleasant for them?
How about I bet you your life I can convince 12 people you are a scum-sucking dirtbag?
I feel like the biggest scumbag on earth every time I see your kid smiling at me.
You've probably convinced yourself by now you're actually doing the world a favor:
I don't know, uh, all the talk about... how you wouldn't have to put up with the scum of the Earth anymore.

Now if you don't think you can do that, if you don't think you can commit to becoming the lowest form of life, the kind that lives by his wits the kind that doesn't take " no" for an answer, then I suggest you leave.
What they meant, I now know this, was, "When are you taking this scum out of our country?"
The same sort of scum who killed her is coming after me, and you're helping him.
You all think... you all think that I'm scum that you're better than me that you're better than my dad.
That's why, normal people like us... have to tell that scum that the easy going is finished!
My family. The dregs of a once-illustrious name.
But today you're lucky pieces of shit, Because Uncle Sam wants you.
It is well within my power to have you and the rest of your scum family face down in the canal before the year is out.
